meanings.definition: To make something new or different by changing or improving it
meanings.sent1: She reinvents her wardrobe by adding colorful accessories.
meanings.sent2: The artist reinvents traditional songs with a modern twist.
meanings.sent3: He reinvents his hairstyle every month, keeping everyone guessing.
meanings.sent4: The chef reinvents classic dishes by infusing them with unique flavors.
meanings.sent5: The inventor reinvents the wheel, making it lighter and more durable.

meanings.definition: To bring something back into existence or use
meanings.sent1: After years of neglect, she reinvents her old hobby of painting.
meanings.sent2: The company reinvents an old marketing strategy to attract new customers.
meanings.sent3: He reinvents his childhood toy, bringing back memories of joy.
meanings.sent4: The archaeologist reinvents ancient artifacts, revealing their hidden stories.
meanings.sent5: The author reinvents a forgotten character, giving them a new role in the story.

meanings.definition: To create something new based on existing ideas or concepts
meanings.sent1: The designer reinvents vintage fashion trends for the modern era.
meanings.sent2: The scientist reinvents a theory by incorporating recent discoveries.
meanings.sent3: He reinvents a classic recipe, adding a surprising ingredient.
meanings.sent4: The musician reinvents a famous melody with a fresh interpretation.
meanings.sent5: The architect reinvents traditional building materials for sustainable construction.
